ForearmsBBReverseWristCurl.name: Barbell Reverse Wrist Curl
ForearmsBBReverseWristCurl.preparation: Sit and grasp bar with narrow to shoulder width overhand grip. Rest forearms on thighs with wrists just beyond knees.
ForearmsBBReverseWristCurl.execution: Raise barbell by pointing knuckles upward as high as possible. Return until knuckles are pointing downward as far as possible. Repeat.
ForearmsBBReverseWristCurl.comments: Keep elbows approximately wrist height to maintain resistance through full range of motion.
